item.description:
Time for another Dinner and a Movie. Let's switch the dinner location this time and go to the new Pepe's Pizza. It's located at:

Pepe's Restaurant & Lounge
221 Buckland Hills Drive
Manchester, CT
860-644-7333
http://www.pepespizze...

I haven't been to the new one in Manchester but I can tell you that the pizza in their original New Haven location is excellent (and famous too). Several meetup members give it a good review.

Afterward, we'll see Burn After Reading at the Showcase Cinema near Buckland. The address is listed above. The movie time is 8:00. If anyone is skipping the dinner and meeting us at the movie, please just make a note in your RSVP. This is opening weekend so you might want to consider getting your ticket prior to the dinner.

This is the new Coen brothers' movie.

After the movie we can always grab a drink at Shea's.

If anyone needs to reach me, my cell phone number is 203-812-0705.
